texts.biography: Known by most as the 'Living Darkness', Sherkan is one of the most feared Gorynyches to ever walk the lands. Wherever Sherkan is, Darkness is known to follow.
texts.name: Sherkan

specialty.description:
{Gorynyches}

All Gorynyches under Sherkan command have 30% chance for Acid Breath with 10 HP damage per creature after attack. Also Sherkan has mobile Veil of Darkness.
specialty.name: Gorynyches/Darkness
